name: Ghost Hover
description:
WARNING

I messed up with the sound volume, so it might be too loud. I've warned you!

Fast paced 2d action game.

You need to go through the levels filled with dangerous traps. In order to do so, you have to use your hover board and a set of different abilities.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • RMB or Space - use ability
  • QE or Mouse wheel - switch between abilities

Tips:

  • Use Grapper ability to quickly get around the corners
  • While you linked to the Grapper you move faster
  • Dash can destroy turrets and walls

Assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/futuristic-music-game-music

https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

https://opengameart.org/content/100-plus-game-sound-effects-wavoggm4a

All the other assets were made by me during the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2
